releaseNotes:
We update the app regularly so we can make it better
- Crash fixes 
- UI/UX improvements
description:
Zoomerang is a powerful yet easy-to-use template based video creator and editor app. With this all-in-one video creation studio you can create and share original and trending videos on all short-form video platforms by making it as simple as a few taps. Join the Zoomerang community of over 25 million users around the world and stay tuned to the emerging social media trends due to the unique and creative content of the platform.



Features:

TEMPLATES

	- Shoot trendy and short-form platform relevant videos with step by step tutorials
	- Follow hashtags to easily find viral-style video templates with featuring famous songs for any category 
	- Join our community of 200,000 template creators and participate in cool challenges
	- Send us your favorite challenge from TikTok and we will make its template to simplify the shooting
	- Stay tuned to the emerging social media trends by following featured templates


VIDEO EDITOR

	- Create and edit videos as a pro with the easy-to-use yet powerful video editor tool
	- Add text on videos with 30+ custom fonts
	- Edit your text with exclusive features: animations, colorful shadows, various borders and more!
	- Split, reverse and transform your video to enjoy the art of composition
	- Search from millions of stickers, gifs, and emojis and add them to your videos
	- Import background music to your videos from your phone or extensive library of Itunes
	- No music available? Choose the type of music you want (genre, mood, etc.) and let the app generate songs for you

TOOLS


	- Make your video entertaining and astonishing using our Stickers feature
	- Beautify yourself with Face Beautification tool to look amazing in every video you make
	- List your favorite colors and let Change Color effect do the magic 
	- Remove background with just a few taps
 	- Create trendy video collages with your favorite visuals
	- Use Face Zoom effect to let the camera zooming of your face

EFFECTS & FILTERS

	- Bring your creativity to life with 300+ aesthetic effects
	- Choose from various amazing Ai effects: Copies, Ai Vins, Special, Liquis
	- Unleash your inner artist with filters such as Aesthetic, Retro, Style, B&M and more!

SOCIAL MEDIA

	- Easily save and share your truly working videos on TikTok, Instagram, Snapchat, Likee, and Youtube, and go viral!
	- Stay tuned to the emerging social media trends due to the unique and creative content of the platform

VIDEO RECORDER

	- Shoot part by part and apply live effects/filters to your video while recording to make it more eye-catching


Download Zoomerang now and go viral on all social media platforms with the trendy videos you will create via your all-in-one video creation studio!

There is some information about the auto-renew nature of the Premium Subscription:


The following are the subscription periods:
Year plan: $29.99/year
Weekly plan: $4.99/week


- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cons of the renewal.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings at the iTunes store after purchase.
 
Privacy: https://bit.ly/zoomerangprivacypolicy

Please send your questions and feedback to info@zoomerang.app
